snippet: An air taxi crashed Sunday at an airport in Alaska, killing all 10 people aboard, a National Transportation Safety Board investigator said.
abstract: National Transportation Safety Board investigators say an air taxi crashed at an airport in Soldotna, Alaska, killing all 10 people aboard.
lead_paragraph: An air taxi crashed Sunday at an airport in Alaska, killing all 10 people aboard, a National Transportation Safety Board investigator said.

headline.main: Air Crash in Alaska Kills Pilot and 9 Passengers
headline.print_headline: Alaska Air Crash Kills Pilot and 9 Passengers
